feedback.name: Rashaun B.
feedback.comment: Thank you Brad, Now it's time to gather my portfolio, update my linkedIn photo, and also resume and get a job. Lets go! Rashaun Bennett

feedback.name: Cankat G.
feedback.comment: Good, comprehensive projects to learn react! Also on Q&A mr Will's detailed answers was so much helpful.

feedback.name: Bill H.
feedback.comment: I learned a great deal from the course and appreciated that the material was up-to-date (Fall 2022) or that adjustments where added later; for example, React Router DOM v6.

feedback.name: James G.
feedback.comment: I've known Brad for a while now. I've been working with React for the past couple of months with the little knowledge I had. This course helped be explore all there is in React.:)

feedback.name: Serhat S.
feedback.comment: I love Brad’s courses. Learned a lot from him. But in this course, last MERN project had me lost.Brad uses Redux Toolkit to handle most of the functions. If you are like me and didn’t use Redux toolkit going through the content becomes a torture.

feedback.name: Abdul Haseeb K.
feedback.comment: Overall good course but more explanation could have helped the learner understand things better. Instead of 4 projects, 3 projects were enough to cover all concepts, and remaining time could have been used for details explanation.
